text:
Hi guys, I'm Laura Vitale and on this episode
of Laura in the Kitchen I'm going to show

you how I like to make my no-churn peanut
butter Ice Cream.
It's so good!
No churn, no ice cream machine required.

It's really, literally four ingredients, I
am going to add some chocolate later on so

that is an option, but to make the peanut
butter ice cream base, you need four ingredients.
And it is so good!
Oh you're going to love it so much!

Okay, what I've got here is some smooth peanut
butter, I've got some heavy cream, sweetened

condensed milk, and vanilla extract, that
is literally all you need.

Now for the peanut butter, there is something
called natural peanut butter in your peanut

butter aisle, and that's usually the kind
where the only ingredient is peanuts.

But it separates, so the oil separates from
the peanuts I guess, It's hard to describe,

but that is not the kind you want to use for
this, because it ends up splitting in the

actual batter and it doesn't incorporate well,
so just the kind of stuff you put on some

PB&J is the kind of stuff you want for this
recipe because it gets really nice and creamy,
it's intensely peanut-y and it is delicious.

Alright I'm going to use my handy dandy little
electric whisk, obviously, and I'm going to

just whisk my heavy cream until it develops
stiff peaks.

Perfect, I'm just going to use the same whisk
to do this part, why not, right?

I'm going to add my creamy peanut butter,
you could use crunchy if you want to, I just

prefer creamy, to the sweetened condensed
milk, and get it all off of your spatula,
the rest will be for snacking.

A small drizzle of some vanilla extract, not
much.
About maybe a teaspoon or so.

And I'm just going to patiently cream these
together, it is going to take some patience

because the sweetened condensed milk is quite
thick and the peanut butter itself is quite

thick so it's just going to take about a minute
or so to get it all going.

Okay, now what you do is you take about a
quarter of this heavy cream mixture, and you're

going to add it in and whisk it with your
electric whisk.

This is to kind of loosen the mixture a little
bit so it makes it easier to fold in the rest

of the cream without deflating it, but I can't
do that just yet because the sweetened condensed

milk and peanut butter mixture is too thick
so by adding a little bit now, it really helps
get things going.

Alright now you can see it's a lot looser,
and a lot easier to work with.

Now I'm just going to go ahead and add in
the stiff peaks here of the heavy cream and

I'm just going to take my time to kind of
fold it all together, it's going to be the

most rich delicious peanut butter ice cream,
and how easy is that, there is no eggs, sugar,

all that jam, which I do love to make a traditional
ice cream once in a while because I think

really there is nothing like it, it's it's
own thing, but any easy ice creams like this

are so fantastic, you can just change the
flavor so many ways.

I make a lemon that is just so out of this
world, we love it and I might share it with

you - if you'd like of course, but it requires
a few ingredients that you might already have
on hand and it makes such a good ice cream.
Alright, that is it!

Don't over mix it, if you don't have to, this
is perfect, I"m going to place this into a

container, I want to make sure I've got a
tight fitting lid on the container, and this

needs to go into the freezer overnight to
set, that is the only bad part about this

is that it does require some time to set,
but in that time, you'll be getting some beauty
sleep, or whatever your heart desires to do.

I don't really know or care that much as long
as the ice cream is in the freezer, waiting
for you for the next day.
That is all I care about, pop this in here.
Put a lid on, I'll see you tomorrow.
In a few seconds.
Mmm..

My ice cream was in the freezer overnight
if you can just because it sets beautifully,

and then you're good to go, now for the chocolate
component which you don't need because this

is so incredible, you could stir in some chocolate

shaved chocolate, you could do a hard shell,

is my chocolate sundae sauce, I've shared

because of the cocoa, it is phenomenal.
